title: Add daily reflection area with custom header text

requirements.text: Create a DailyReflection component that displays a text area for writing notes for the currently selected date from the Calendar component, with a header showing 'एकत्रा' on the first line and 'वीर भोग्या वसुंधरा' on the second line, using the same warm earth-tone styling and mobile-responsive layout patterns as other components

quotes: add one Daily reflection area in which i could write a note for each day and one and also write a note at the top "एकत्रा" and then in next line "वीर भोग्या वसुंधरा"

acceptanceCriteria: Component displays header text 'एकत्रा' followed by 'वीर भोग्या वसुंधरा' on the next line
Text area allows users to write and edit reflection notes
Component is styled with warm earth tones consistent with existing design
Component is mobile-responsive with touch-friendly controls (44px minimum)
Component integrates with the selected date from Calendar component

requirements.text: Add backend data model and storage for daily reflections that associates a date with reflection text content, and implement public functions to save and retrieve reflection notes by date

quotes: add one Daily reflection area in which i could write a note for each day

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores reflection text for each date
Public function to set/update reflection for a specific date
Public function to retrieve reflection by date
Reflection data persists across application restarts
Migration support if needed for existing actor state

requirements.text: Create React Query hooks in useQueries.ts for daily reflection operations (save reflection, get reflection by date) with proper optimistic updates, cache invalidation, and toast notifications for success/error states
acceptanceCriteria: Hook to save/update reflection for a date with optimistic updates
Hook to fetch reflection by date
Toast notifications on successful save
Toast notifications on error
Proper cache invalidation after mutations

requirements.text: Integrate the DailyReflection component into the DateDetailsPanel component so that when a date is selected in the Calendar, users can view and edit the reflection for that specific date alongside tasks and performance rating
acceptanceCriteria: DailyReflection component appears in DateDetailsPanel
Reflection loads automatically when a date is selected
Reflection saves properly when text area is modified
Component layout remains mobile-responsive
Component follows existing DateDetailsPanel styling patterns

constraints: Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Use existing warm earth-tone color palette and styling patterns
Ensure touch-friendly controls with 44px minimum height for mobile
nonGoals: Rich text editing or formatting in reflection text area
